name: 8/8/88 Needle AL
description:
Welcome to the small rural town of Needle, Alabama. After his daily morning walk, Godfrey arrives back to town only to discover that something is terribly off. What happened in this town and where did everyone go? Unravel the bizarre, tragic and grim mystery as you traverse the eerie landscape.

8/8/88 Needle AL is told through beautiful and haunting 3D photographs that add a new level of realistic atmosphere . It's a unique mix of visual novel, walking sim, and hidden objects game. This game is in the same vain as our previous title "Wardwell House" which was enjoyed by many horror fans. This version of Needle AL is just the alpha version. We need feedback from you, the community, to help guide us about the direction of the game. More chapters are in the works that will be shaped according to this feedback and we plan to release these chapters in the full version.
